text: @WhiteHouse IDEA to SAVE LIVES amid the coronavirus! Invisible SHIELD {PPE} ULTRAVIOLET, infrared LIGHT, formed to the contours of your body! Via electronic devices! Head to Toe!!! #BlueTooth #patent #buymyidea @TheEllenShow @CDCDirector @CDCgov @ellentube
